Thanks a lot everyone! I love these flags! Hopefully someone has 1.5 and can upload it!

A Kerbalized version of this flag would be delightful.

Hail Cascadia!
See first post for Dropbox link.
Don't you think that there should be several versions of each flag. Like the german flag without the emblem but with a single rocket on there for example

Added Mission Patches for Kerpollo Program: 

![NBMRegD.png](http://i.imgur.com/NBMRegD.png)

Could you also add a Kerbalized version of the Logo of the German Space Agency?

I mean its space operations are basically bound to those of ESA yet it's still one of the largest space research Agencies in Europe

[https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f5/DLR_Logo.svg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f5/DLR_Logo.svg)

I'll need to give it some thought. Apart from the obvious KLR, nothing immediately jumps out, but yea, I'll bump that one in with the next upload.
Cool, Thank you in advance then :-)

Can you do an Argentinian flag?

(you know, Argentina es one of 9 countries that can produce geostationary satellites.)

Or at least it could until the new government gave away everything to foreign corporations...  

But still, I would like an Argentinian flag on my ships and I don't know how to do them, so it would be nice if you'd add them to your pack.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-02-16T02:15:10Z" title="02/16/2017 02:15  AM" data-short="7 yr">February 16, 2017</time> by Agustin**
So... it's been a while. Argentina now has a space agency in this update.

Oops. Fixed some stuff. No more blank white rectangles.

**Edited <time datetime="2020-06-16T01:42:28Z" title="06/16/2020 01:42  AM" data-short="4 yr">June 16, 2020</time> by DirtyFace83**

I like this pack, but my only issue is with the Canadian flag. An upside down maple leaf is used as a sign of distress... but that's just me being an Army brat and having flag etiquette hammered into me. Thanks for the update!

Lol, it honestly didn't occur to me. If it makes you feel easier, think of the Maple Leaf as the stuff that makes the rockets go. Plus, making something that resembles a maple leaf out of rockets (believe me, I tried) is super complicated.

Looking into Suit Textures and maybe some Soviet mission/program patch analogs next. It may take a while though, so no holding of breath is advised.

Fingers crossed that these will be compatible with the upcoming stock decals!

thanks for sharing your work!
Udpated for compatibility with Conformal Decals by drewcassidy

[@DirtyFace83](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/131509-dirtyface83/) These are great. They all look really kerbal in very funny and interesting ways. Good job!

But, the Mexican flag... a hat? Really? I would suggest an image of a Kraken grappling a kerbal vessel. Kind of like those images with sailing ships.

Your decals and badges are great too. Thanks for putting this together.
